Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rush Limbaugh wrote the open letter thanking President Trump. The expert's verdict clearly states that the letter was not penned by Limbaugh.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it falsely attributes the open letter to Rush Limbaugh without any evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Rush Limbaugh wrote the open letter without verifying the authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the letter was circulating online before Limbaugh's name was attached to it, and it was subsequently modified to make it more impactful.
